name: Sesame Broccoli Salad
author: sal
summary: This bright green salad features blanched broccoli tossed in a light sesame dressing with toasted sesame seeds. Quick and delicious!
ingredients: 1 ½ pounds fresh broccoli, cut into bite size pieces
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Toast sesame seeds for 3 to 5 minutes, or until the seeds begin to turn golden brown
Bring a large pot of water to a boil
Cook broccoli in boiling water for 3 to 5 minutes, or until desired tenderness
Drain, and transfer to a large bowl
In a small bowl, whisk together the vinegar, soy sauce, sesame oil, sugar, and sesame seeds
Pour over broccoli, and toss to coat
